siteTitle.description: The title displayed in the browser tab and header

siteDescription.default: Browse and download files from Azure Blob Storage

logoUrl.description: URL to a custom logo image (leave empty for default)

logoFile.description: Path to a custom logo image file, relative to the config folder (e.g., 'my-logo.svg'). Takes precedence over logoUrl.

analyticsScript.description: Path to a custom analytics JavaScript file, relative to the /config folder (e.g., 'analytics.js'). The file contents will be injected into the page.

favorites.description: List of favorites to display in the sidebar

type.description: Type of favorite: folder (navigate to path), search (run a search), or pattern (auto-match folders)

path.description: For 'folder' type: the folder path to navigate to

query.description: For 'search' type: the search query to run

pattern.description: For 'pattern' type: regex pattern to match top-level folders

limit.description: For 'pattern' type: maximum number of matches to show

sortOrder.description: For 'pattern' type: sort order for matched folders
